VIEWS_SPEC.VIEW_TEXT:
("RESPONSE_ID","CHANNEL_ID","CHANNEL_NAME","RESPONSE_DATE","SOURCE_ID","TITLE_SUBJECT","RESPONSE_BODY","ATTACHMENTS","ACTIVE","PROCESSED","CHANNEL_RESPONSE_ID","PID","BODY","FEED_DATA_ID","PROCESSED_FLAG","ATTACHMENT","EMAIL_BODY","RECIPIENT","SENDER","SERVER","CREATION_DATE","REVIEW_UNCHECKED","FOLLOW_UNCHECKED","REVIEW_CHECKED","FOLLOW_CHECKED") AS select Ch_Resp_Dtls.Response_Id, Ch_Resp_Dtls.Channel_Id, --MS_RGA_UTILITIES.GET_CHANNEL_NAME(Ch_Resp_Dtls.CHANNEL_ID) AS CHANNEL_NAME, chn_dtl.channel_name AS CHANNEL_NAME, Ch_Resp_Dtls.Response_Date as RESPONSE_DATE, Ch_Resp_Dtls.Source_Id, Ch_Resp_Dtls.Title_Subject, --Ch_Resp_Dtls.Response_Body, null Response_Body, Ch_Resp_Dtls.Attachments, Ch_Resp_Dtls.Active, CH_RESP_DTLS.PROCESSED, Ch_Resp_Dtls.response_id channel_response_id, Ch_Resp_Dtls.FEED_DATA_ID PID, FEEDS.body , Feeds.Feed_Data_Id, Feeds.Processed_Flag, '''' || Feeds.Attachment || ''', 10' AS Attachment, --null Attachment, Feeds.Body email_body, Feeds.Recipient, Feeds.Sender, FEEDS.SERVER, FEEDS.CREATION_DATE, '<input id="CHK_' || 'R' || '_' || Feeds.Feed_Data_Id || '" type="checkbox" name="reviewedChk" unchecked value=' || '"' || Feeds.Feed_Data_Id || '"' || ' onClick="javascript:populateReviewed(this)">' REVIEW_UNCHECKED,
'<input id="CHK_' || 'F' || '_' || Feeds.Feed_Data_Id || '" type="checkbox" name="followedChk" unchecked value=' || '"' || Feeds.Feed_Data_Id || '"' || ' onClick="javascript:populateFollowup(this)">' FOLLOW_UNCHECKED,
'<input id="CHK_' || 'R' || '_' ||Feeds.Feed_Data_Id || '" type="checkbox" name="reviewedChk" checked value=' || '"' || Feeds.Feed_Data_Id || '"' || ' onClick="javascript:populateReviewed(this)">' REVIEW_CHECKED,
'<input id="CHK_' || 'F' || '_' || Feeds.Feed_Data_Id || '" type="checkbox" name="followedChk" checked value=' || '"' || Feeds.Feed_Data_Id || '"' || ' onClick="javascript:populateFollowup(this)">' FOLLOW_CHECKED From Ms_Rga_Channel_Response_Dtls Ch_Resp_Dtls, MS_RGA_FEED_AGGREGATOR_V FEEDS, MS_RGA_CHANNEL_DTLS chn_dtl where Ch_Resp_Dtls.feed_data_id = FEEDS.FEED_DATA_ID and FEED_SENT_DATE >= trunc(sysdate) - ms_rga_utilities.get_parameter_value(1,'MS_RGA_Configuration','RGA_Day_Alerts_Filter') and Ch_Resp_Dtls.PROCESSED = 'P' and chn_dtl.object_id=Ch_Resp_Dtls.CHANNEL_ID
